data.content: Generate a top-level with a presentation item, a question and answer item, and an item to order a pizza. Generate ONLY the top-level.

Here is the complete YAML content for the top-level module as per your request. It includes a presentation item, a question and answer item, and an item to order a pizza.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to our pizza ordering chatbot! Here, you can ask questions about our menu, get answers to your queries, and place your pizza orders.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I did not get what you said. Can you rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Pizza Q&A
    kind: module
    reference: pizza_qa
  - title: Order a pizza
    kind: module
    reference: order_pizza
  - title: Welcome message
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Hello! I'm here to assist you with your pizza orders and any questions you may have. What would you like to do today?
```

Make sure to replace the `reference` values with the actual module names you will create for the pizza Q&A and ordering functionalities. Let me know if you need further assistance!
